members.name: isShowingBottom
members.comment: Return whether or not this end crystal is showing the bedrock slate underneath it.

return: true if the bottom is being shown

members.name: setShowingBottom
members.comment: Sets whether or not this end crystal is showing the bedrock slate underneath it.

param: showing - whether the bedrock slate should be shown

members.name: getBeamTarget
members.comment: Gets the location that this end crystal is pointing its beam to.

return: the location that the beam is pointed to, or null if the beam is not shown

members.name: setBeamTarget
members.comment: Sets the location that this end crystal is pointing to. Passing a null value will remove the current beam.

param: location - the location to point the beam to
throws: IllegalArgumentException - for differing worlds

name: org.bukkit.entity.EnderCrystal
comment: A crystal that heals nearby EnderDragons
